description: Default question configuration for analyzing CIPP (Cured-In-Place Pipe) project specifications

sections.description: Basic project details, scope, and administrative information

questions.text: What is the project name and location?
What is the total project duration or timeline?
What is the total linear footage of pipe to be rehabilitated?
What pipe sizes (diameters) are included in the project?
What is the project budget or estimated cost?
What are the submission deadlines for bids or proposals?
Who is the project owner or contracting authority?
Are there any pre-bid meetings or site visits scheduled?
What bonding and insurance requirements are specified?
What payment terms and schedule are outlined?

sections.description: Material specifications, ASTM standards, and technical requirements

questions.text: What resin type is required (polyester, vinyl ester, epoxy)?
What ASTM standards apply to the CIPP materials?
What is the required design thickness of the liner?
What flexural strength requirements are specified?
What flexural modulus requirements are specified?
Are there any specific felt material requirements?
What are the chemical resistance requirements?
Are there specific requirements for liner permeability?
What certification or testing documentation is required for materials?
Are there any material submittal or approval requirements?

sections.description: Installation requirements, curing methods, and quality control procedures

questions.text: What installation method is specified (inversion, pull-in-place, other)?
What curing method is required (steam, hot water, UV, ambient)?
What are the minimum and maximum curing temperature requirements?
What is the required curing duration?
Are there specific requirements for pre-installation cleaning or inspection?
What bypass pumping requirements are specified?
Are there specific requirements for service lateral reconnections?
What end seal requirements are specified?
Are there manhole-to-manhole or continuous lining requirements?
What are the requirements for monitoring curing parameters?

sections.description: Quality control testing, inspection requirements, and acceptance criteria

questions.text: What pre-installation CCTV inspection requirements exist?
What post-installation CCTV inspection requirements exist?
What air or vacuum testing requirements are specified?
What hydrostatic or leakage testing is required?
Are flexural property tests required on cured samples?
How many test samples are required per liner installation?
What are the acceptance criteria for installed liners?
What deflection testing or measurement is required?
Are there specific documentation or reporting requirements for testing?
What third-party inspection or certification is required?

sections.description: Safety protocols, environmental requirements, and regulatory compliance

questions.text: What confined space entry requirements are specified?
What traffic control and road closure requirements exist?
Are there specific OSHA or safety plan requirements?
What environmental permits or compliance requirements are needed?
Are there odor control or emission requirements during curing?
What waste disposal requirements are specified?
Are there noise or working hours restrictions?
What emergency response procedures are required?
Are there specific requirements for protecting water quality?
What personal protective equipment (PPE) is mandated?

sections.description: Equipment specifications, crew requirements, and resource needs

questions.text: What specific equipment or machinery is required for the project?
Are there minimum crew size or staffing requirements?
What certification or training requirements exist for operators?
Are there backup equipment or redundancy requirements?
What boiler or heating system specifications are required?
Are there specific camera or inspection equipment requirements?
What staging area or work site requirements exist?
Are there utility locating or coordination requirements?
What water supply or discharge requirements are specified?
Are there specific requirements for monitoring equipment during curing?

sections.description: Warranty requirements, deliverables, and project closeout procedures

questions.text: What warranty period is required for the CIPP installation?
What items or defects are covered under warranty?
What as-built documentation is required at project completion?
Are there O&M (Operations & Maintenance) manual requirements?
What final testing or certification deliverables are required?
Are there record drawing or GIS data submission requirements?
What site restoration or cleanup requirements exist?
Are there final inspection or acceptance procedures specified?
What retention or liquidated damages provisions are included?
Are there close-out meeting or final presentation requirements?

sections.description: Unique project constraints, special requirements, and site-specific conditions

questions.text: Are there specific working depth or elevation constraints?
What groundwater or high water table conditions exist?
Are there adjacent structure or utility protection requirements?
What prevailing wage or labor requirements apply?
Are there DBE/MBE/WBE participation requirements?
What American-made or Buy America requirements exist?
Are there specific sequencing or phasing requirements?
What coordination with other contractors or projects is required?
Are there historic preservation or archeological requirements?
What pandemic or health-related protocols are specified?

sections.description: Bid pricing requirements, unit prices, and payment schedules

questions.text: What unit pricing structure is required (per linear foot, lump sum)?
Are there separate bid items for different pipe diameters?
What mobilization or demobilization costs are allowed?
Are there allowances or contingencies included in the bid?
What payment retention percentage is specified?
How frequently will progress payments be made?
Are there incentive or penalty clauses related to schedule?
What documentation is required for payment applications?
Are there value engineering or cost savings provisions?
What change order procedures and pricing are outlined?

sections.description: Required contractor qualifications, experience, and references

questions.text: What minimum years of CIPP experience are required?
Are there specific project size or complexity requirements for experience?
How many project references are required?
What licensing or certification is required for the contractor?
Are there financial capacity or bonding limitations?
What key personnel qualifications and resumes are required?
Are there manufacturer certification or training requirements?
What safety record or EMR (Experience Modification Rate) requirements exist?
Are there prequalification or qualification statement requirements?
What quality assurance/quality control plan requirements are specified?
